description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，二级大法官，曾任河南省高级人民法院院长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a Second Grand Justice, and former President of the Henan High People's Court.

nodes.id: 咸阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 咸阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共咸阳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CCP Xianyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替张立勇担任中共咸阳市委书记和咸阳市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, succeeded Zhang Liyong as Secretary of the CCP Xianyang Municipal Committee and Mayor of Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共咸阳市秦都区委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CCP Qindu District Committee, Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替张立勇担任中共咸阳市秦都区委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, succeeded Zhang Liyong as Secretary of the CCP Qindu District Committee, Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任咸阳市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任河南省高级人民法院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former President of the Henan High People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替张立勇担任河南省高级人民法院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician, succeeded Zhang Liyong as President of the Henan High People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 1982年毕业于山东大学哲学系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Philosophy at Shandong University in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 2003年获西北政法学院法律硕士学位。
description.en: Obtained a Master of Laws degree from Northwest University of Political Science and Law in 2003.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

position.en: Officer, Deputy Division Chief, Division Chief

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1993年期间，在中共中央纪律检查委员会历任干事、副处长、处长。
description.en: From 1982 to 1993, he served successively as an officer, deputy division chief, and division chief at the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国共产党河间市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在1982年至1993年期间，曾挂职河北省河间市委副书记一年。
description.en: During the period from 1982 to 1993, he served a one-year temporary assignment as Deputy Secretary of the Hejian Municipal Committee of the CCP in Hebei Province.

relationships.target: 中国共产党咸阳市秦都区委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任中共咸阳市秦都区委书记。
description.en: Served as Secretary of the CCP Qindu District Committee in Xianyang.

relationships.target: 中国共产党咸阳市委员会

position.en: Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary, Secretary

description.zh-cn: 历任中共咸阳市委常委、副书记，并于2005年9月升任市委书记。
description.en: Served successively as a Standing Committee Member and Deputy Secretary of the CCP Xianyang Municipal Committee, and was promoted to Secretary in September 2005.

description.zh-cn: 1999年兼任咸阳市常务副市长，2002年7月升任市长。
description.en: Concurrently served as Executive Vice Mayor of Xianyang in 1999, and was promoted to Mayor in July 2002.

relationships.target: 咸阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任咸阳市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Xianyang Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2007年12月转任河南省高级人民法院党组书记，次年1月任院长。
description.en: Transferred to the position of Party Group Secretary of the Henan High People's Court in December 2007, and became President the following January.

description.zh-cn: 曾任第十一届、第十二届全国人大代表（河南省）。
description.en: Served as a delegate to the 11th and 12th National People's Congress (Henan).

description.zh-cn: 当选为河南省法官协会会长。
description.en: Was elected President of the Henan Judges Association.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇接替宋洪武担任中国共产党咸阳市委员会书记职务。
description.en: Zhang Liyong succeeded Song Hongwu as the Secretary of the CCP Xianyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇的中国共产党咸阳市委员会书记和咸阳市市长职务均由千军昌接替。
description.en: Qian Junchang succeeded Zhang Liyong as both the Secretary of the CCP Xianyang Municipal Committee and the Mayor of Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇接替马铁山担任中国共产党咸阳市秦都区委员会书记职务。
description.en: Zhang Liyong succeeded Ma Tieshan as the Secretary of the CCP Qindu District Committee in Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇的中国共产党咸阳市秦都区委员会书记职务由徐新荣接替。
description.en: Xu Xinrong succeeded Zhang Liyong as the Secretary of the CCP Qindu District Committee in Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇接替李堂堂担任咸阳市市长职务。
description.en: Zhang Liyong succeeded Li Tangtang as the Mayor of Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇接替李道民担任河南省高级人民法院院长职务。
description.en: Zhang Liyong succeeded Li Daomin as the President of the Henan High People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 张立勇的河南省高级人民法院院长职务由胡道才接替。
description.en: Hu Daocai succeeded Zhang Liyong as the President of the Henan High People's Court.
